detaileddescription.para:
Structure for holding coding values
values Described in T_S_BAP_Coding_EL type unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram

State of KL_15 signal
values TRUE/FALSE unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram

Copy of a value of signal fahrzeuggeschwindigkeit_max_u16
values 0..65535 unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram

Copy of a value of signal comingHome_Time
values 0..255 unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram

Copy of a value of signal comingHome_State bit 1
values 0..1 unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram

Structure for holding parameter values
values described in T_S_NvM_BapHandler_EL type unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram

Default values for the properties that are held in NvM
values described in T_S_NvM_BapHandler_EL type unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram

Default values for the pesonalized properties that are held in NvM
values described in T_S_NvM_BapHandler_PSO_ImExport type unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram

Structure used for PSO functionality by ATN
values Described in T_S_BapI_BAPHandlerData_PSO_ImExport_Data unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram

Structure for holding function list data
values Described in fctDataBH_s type unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram

Structure for holding user data
values Described in T_S_BapI_BAPHandlerData_PSO_ImExport_PSOUser type unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram

Structure for holding PSO parameter data
values Described in T_S_BapI_PSO_ImExport_PSO_Data type unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram

Array of structures for PSO functinality
values described in T_S_BapI_BAPHandlerData_PSO_ImExport_ParameterMap type unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram

Structure with functions pointers used by ATN for PSO functionality
values N/A unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram

Buffer for PSO_ImExport message
values Array of 0..255 unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram

Array of a copy of modification values
values array of values 0..255 unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram

Structure for holding copy of parameter values
values described in T_S_NvM_BapHandler_EL type unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram

Structure for holding personalized parameter values
values described in T_S_NvM_BapHandler_PSO_ImExport type unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram

Structure for holding copy of personalized parameter values
values described in T_S_NvM_BapHandler_PSO_ImExport type unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram
bapi_dv_DefaultsForEL

Function for writing personalized and non personalized properties to NvM
reentrant No context task context thread safe No - Integration must insure that the function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous

detaileddescription.para: bapi_DH_EL_isBAPInitialized

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8 *data_pu8, uint8 len_u8, uint8 bit_u8, boolean value_b)
memberdef.name: EL_setBitInBuffer

detaileddescription.para: EL_setBitInBuffer

Function for setting given bit in given buffer. Used to set function list bits. Bits are moved from MSB to LSB.
reentrant No context task context thread safe No - Integration must insure that the function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous

parameterdescription.para: - pointer to buffer bit_u8 - bit number to be set value_b - value to be set at given bit

simplesect.title: Test Method
simplesect.para: The following method is tested in TEST_EL_setBitInBuffer

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: Design Decision - Justification. - Helper function for setting bits in function list

detaileddescription.para: EL_setBit

Function for setting given bit in given data pointer.
reentrant No context task context thread safe No - Integration must insure that the function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous

parameterdescription.para: - pointer to data bitNumber_u8 - bit number to be set value_b - value to be set at given bit

simplesect.title: Test Method
simplesect.para: The following method is tested in TEST_EL_setBit

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: Design Decision - Justification. - Helper function for setting bit in given pointer

detaileddescription.para: EL_memset

Function for setting given buffer with given value.
reentrant No context task context thread safe No - Integration must insure that the function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous

parameterdescription.para: - pointer to buffer val - value that should be set num_u32 - length of the buffer

simplesect.title: Test Method
simplesect.para: The following method is tested in TEST_EL_memset

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: Design Decision - Justification. - Helper function for setting buffer with given value

detaileddescription.para: EL_getBit

Function for getting bit value at given position
reentrant No context task context thread safe No - Integration must insure that the function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous

parameterdescription.para: - value from which the bit should be returned bitPos_u8 - bit position which value should be returned

simplesect.para: boolean - TRUE if bit is set, FALSE otherwise

simplesect.title: Test Method
simplesect.para: The following method is tested in TEST_EL_getBit

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: Design Decision - Justification. - Helper function for getting bit value at given position

detaileddescription.para: bapi_DH_EL_updateAdaptations

Interface for updating the adaptations. If adaptations are changed, function list or default values are changed
reentrant No context task context thread safe No - Integration must insure that the function is not interrupted by the other functions of the same module multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous
